6.question: what language pairs are explored?

4-Table1-1.png: The language pairs explored are: De-En, En-Fr, Fr-En, En-Es, Ro-En, En-De, Ar-En, En-Es, and En-Ru.</s>

The language pairs explored in the table are English-French (En-Fr), English-German (En-De), English-Russian (En-Ru), and a multi-lingual corpus that includes English, French, German, and Russian (MultiUN).</s>

6.answer: De-En, En-Fr, Fr-En, En-Es, Ro-En, En-De, Ar-En, En-Ru
